Extracted Variables:
- x: amount invested in the favorite clothing company
- y: amount invested in the favorite tech company

Extracted Constraints:
- Investment Amount: x + y \leq 3000
- Minimum Investment in Clothing Company: x \geq 4y
- Maximum Investment in Tech Company: y \leq 500

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 0.07x + 0.10y
